```{r}
library(readr)

```

```{r}

day %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(season = as.factor(season), yr = as.factor(yr), mnth = as.factor(mnth), holiday = as.factor(holiday), weekday = as.factor(weekday), workingday = as.factor(workingday),)
```
